name: Music-renamer
tagline: rename your music with a regex!
body:
# Music-Renamer
Create a "regex.txt" in your music folder.  
Example content:  
```
([0-9])\w+. 
```
**Before:**  
01. Artist - Song.mp3  
**After:**  
Artist - Song.mp3 


Follow the steps. Done.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
